Practice Music.name: Practice Music
Practice Music.desc: Enables Practice Music even if it's locked.

Safe Mode.name: Safe Mode
Safe Mode.desc: Pauses any progress from being done on the level.

Accurate Percentage.name: Accurate Percentage
Accurate Percentage.desc: Allows for decimals in the level percentage. [Beyond thousandths place]

Layout Mode.name: Layout Mode
Layout Mode.desc: Removes all decoration associated with a level.

Cheat Indicator.name: Cheat Indicator
Cheat Indicator.desc: Shows an icon to tell whether or not you are using mods that may be considered cheating!

Speedhack.name: Speedhack
Speedhack.desc: Changes the speed of the game and audio.

FPS Bypass.name: FPS Bypass
FPS Bypass.desc: Unlocks your FPS to be higher than 60 or your monitor's refresh rate.

No Hitbox.name: No Hitbox
No Hitbox.desc: Disables all object hitboxes. Special objects are disabled.

No Solids.name: No Solids
No Solids.desc: Disables most solid hitboxes. Special objects still work.

No Mirror Transition.name: No Mirror Transition
No Mirror Transition.desc: Prevents the screen from being flipped upon a mirror portal.

Instant Complete.name: Instant Complete
Instant Complete.desc: Instantly completes the level. (Do not enable in the Editor)

Force Platformer Mode.name: Force Platformer Mode
Force Platformer Mode.desc: Forces you to be in platformer mode when playing a level.

Change Gravity.name: Change Gravity
Change Gravity.desc: Allows you to change gravity when jumping or falling.

Gravity Value.name: Gravity Value
Gravity Value.desc: The value the gravity should be set to.

Text Length.name: Text Length
Text Length.desc: Allows for unlimited text length in text inputs.

Character Filter.name: Character Filter
Character Filter.desc: Lets you input any character in all text inputs.

Slider Limit.name: Slider Limit
Slider Limit.desc: Lets sliders be dragged beyond the visible limit.

Free Shop Items.name: Free Shop Items
Free Shop Items.desc: Allows all shop items to be bought for 0 mana orbs.

Backup Stars Limit.name: Backup Stars Limit
Backup Stars Limit.desc: Lets you backup data, even with less than 10 stars.

Level Edit.name: Level Edit
Level Edit.desc: Lets you edit any level, access the editor through the pause menu. (UNSTABLE)

Verify Hack.name: Verify Hack
Verify Hack.desc: Lets you upload unverified levels. Will automatically set levels to be verified.

Copy Hack.name: Copy Hack
Copy Hack.desc: Lets you copy any level, without a password.

No (C) Mark.name: No (C) Mark
No (C) Mark.desc: Removes the (C) mark when uploading copied levels. Will automatically set levels to be original.

Hide Testmode.name: Hide Testmode
Hide Testmode.desc: Hides the 'Testmode' text when playing with a startpos.

Rotation Hack.name: Rotation Hack
Rotation Hack.desc: Allows you to rotate any object. Only works locally.

Default Song Bypass.name: Default Song Bypass
Default Song Bypass.desc: Lets you use hidden default songs in the editor.

No Progress Bar.name: No Progress Bar
No Progress Bar.desc: Removes the progress bar! The precentage will still be shown.

Progress Bar Position.name: Progress Bar Position
Progress Bar Position.desc: Sets the position of the progress bar.

Hide Attempts.name: Hide Attempts
Hide Attempts.desc: Whether or not the attempt label should be shown when playing a level.

Attempt Opacity.name: Attempt Opacity
Attempt Opacity.desc: Determines how opaque the attempt label should be.

Enable Patching.name: Enable Patching
Enable Patching.desc: Changes from hooking to patching. This also allows more hacks to be enabled. Only enable if necessary. [Windows Only]

Menu Opacity.name: Menu Opacity
Menu Opacity.desc: Determines how opaque the menu should be.

Theme.name: Theme
Theme.desc: Select the UI theme for Prism Menu!

Live Theme Editing.name: Live Theme Editing
Live Theme Editing.desc: This will allow you to edit your custom theme while seeing changes on screen! (Warning: This may cause a memory leak.)

Show tooltips.name: Show tooltips
Show tooltips.desc: Whether or not tooltips should be shown when hovering over mods.

Show Button.name: Show Button
Show Button.desc: Shows the button to activate the menu. It's recommended to keep this enabled for Android.

Button Position X.name: Button Position X
Button Position X.desc: The X position for the button to open the menu.

Button Position Y.name: Button Position Y
Button Position Y.desc: The Y position for the button to open the menu.

Language.name: Language
Language.desc: Sets the language for Prism Menu!

Restore Defaults.name: Restore Defaults
Restore Defaults.desc: Disables all mods and resets everything to default.

Credits.name: Credits
Credits.desc: People who have helped with the mod!

Thank you to Electrify (ES), Jouca (FR),.name: Thank you to Electrify (ES), Jouca (FR), dank_meme01, savvacorgi, МегаСвятой (RU), Gazonk (BR), huhnmitferrari (DE), and Ignis (CS) for translations!

And thank you for using the mod! I hope.name: And thank you for using the mod! I hope you enjoy using Prism Menu!

Menu Scale.name: Menu Scale
Menu Scale.desc: Decides how big the text and buttons should be. (Will require restarting the game)

Show Hidden Objects.name: Show Hidden Objects
Show Hidden Objects.desc: Shows all hidden objects. This will reset the objects primary color. This will not work on objects with the "Hide" attribute. (Useful with Layout Mode)

Transparent BG.name: Transparent BG
Transparent BG.desc: Automatically reverts colors changed in the background to be their original color.

Speedhack Audio.name: Speedhack Audio
Speedhack Audio.desc: Whether or not to also change the audio speed based on the speedhack value.

Noclip Accuracy.name: Noclip Accuracy
Noclip Accuracy.desc: Informs you how accurate your noclip run is. (Will not work without Anticheat Bypass enabled)

Show Graphic Options.name: Show Graphic Options
Show Graphic Options.desc: Shows you Geometry Dash's graphic options! Useful for Android as the option is normally not available.

No Trail.name: No Trail
No Trail.desc: Disables any trail effect from the player.

No Wave Trail.name: No Wave Trail
No Wave Trail.desc: Disables the trail behind the wave.

Solid Wave Trail.name: Solid Wave Trail
Solid Wave Trail.desc: Removes the blending of both icon colors on the wave trail.
